hadiths.text: It is narrated on the authority of Anas b. Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:Four persons would be brought out from the Fire and would be presented to Allah. One of them would turn (towards the He) ) ) and say: O my Lord, when Thou hast brought me out from it, do not throw me back into it, and Allah would rescue him from it

chapter.ara-name: باب أَدْنَى أَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ مَنْزِلَةً فِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Status of the Lowest people in paradise
